officialTitle: Chemotherapy-Induced Peripheral Neuropathy: Feasibility and Validity of New Symptom Measurement Tools in Patients on Treatment With Platinum Agents, Taxanes and Bortezomib
conditions: Breast Cancer, Colorectal Cancer, Myeloma, Chemotherapy-induced Peripheral Neuropathy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Patients \>= 18 years old.
2. Patients must be fluent with the English language.
3. Patients must be on chemotherapy regimes with any of the study drugs: cisplatin, oxaliplatin, taxanes and/or bortezomib.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Significant cognitive impairment as determined by the trained research staff
2. Chronic alcoholism or substance abuse
3. Diagnosis of severe depression
